quote: I have no doubt that you are more than capable of bringing the Monsean queen and my son and the rest of my sons and a hundred Nanderan kittens through an onslaught of howling raiders if you chose to.
quote_letters: I HAVE NO DOUBT THAT YOU ARE MORE THAN CAPABLE OF BRINGING THE MONSEAN QUEEN AND MY SON AND THE REST OF MY SONS AND A HUNDRED NANDERAN KITTENS THROUGH AN ONSLAUGHT OF HOWLING RAIDERS IF YOU CHOSE TO
